name: Diving deep
description:
Controls:

WASD - move Right click - shoot Right click again - reel in To reel in you need to hit a wall with the spear gun Fish can be killed by reeling through them Killing fish replenishes hp, but using the spear uses up hp

Credits:

Game developed by: Lord Destro Music & sounds by: Christopher Purnell
